data.title: Black Cat Books Inc.
data.meta_description: Novels and Comic Books in Algonquin and Cystal Lake
data.text:
APOTHECARY DIARIES LIGHT NOVEL VOL 01

WriterHyuuga, Natsu

ArtistShino, Touko

Maomao leads an unassuming life with her apothecary father, but kidnappers whisk her away to a world of consorts and serving women in the empire's rear palace. Sold into imperial servitude, the girl keeps her quick wit, sharp mind, and medical knowledge a secret. But the head eunuch, Jinshi, shatters... Read More →

This item will not receive discounts.

BABEL LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 01 (C: 0-1-2)

WriterFurumiya, Kuji

One day, college student Shizuku Minase stumbles from modern day Japan into a fantasy world. While wandering through a backwater region of this world of sword and sorcery, she comes across an eccentric young man named Eric who studies a magic script. He agrees to help her return home on... Read More →

BLACK SUMMONER LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 02 (C: 0-1-2)

WriterMayoi, Doufu

ArtistKurogin,

Following his transmigration, during which he bartered away his memories in exchange for rare and powerful skills, Kelvin is fully enjoying his new life as an adventurer. After making a name for himself in Parth, becoming the city's most famous and respected adventurer along with his close-knit motley crew, he... Read More →

DATE A LIVE LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 12 (C: 0-1-2)

WriterTachibana, Koushi

ArtistTsunako,

When the power of the sealed Spirits builds too high, Shido goes out of control. Before the situation can get any worse, the Spirits try to kiss Shido, but something's different...?

DEMONS CREST LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 01 (C: 0-1-2)

WriterKawahara, Reki

ArtistBalzer, James

Yuuma Ashihara is playing Actual Magic, a virtual reality MMORPG, when it suddenly begins to fuse with the real world. While he tries to make sense of what's happening, he runs into Sumi, one of his classmates. Before, she was one of the cutest girls in his grade, but she's... Read More →

I SWEAR I WONT BOTHER YOU AGAIN LIGHT NOVEL VOL 05 (C: 0-1-0

Violette, daughter of a duke, committed a terrible, jealous crime against her half sister. As she languishes in prison, something unexpected happens: time is rewound, sending her back to the day her problems began! Armed with the memories of her disastrous first go-round, Violette is determined to live a quiet,... Read More →

KEPT MAN OF PRINCESS KNIGHT LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 02 (C: 0-1-2)

WriterShirogane, Toru

Matthew has a seemingly endless list of troubles. Arwin symptoms and recovery are worrying, and her party isn't making much progress in the dungeon. The Sun God's influence is spreading surreptitiously. And Imperial Guard knights have been dispatched from the royal capital to maintain public order in the Dungeon City.... Read More →

LIAR LIAR LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 04 (C: 0-1-2)

WriterKuou, Haruki

Artistkonomi,

The May Interschool Competition has been thrown into chaos by the Chameleon, a cheater able to impersonate anyone in the Game. Hiroto's team has managed to stay in the running, but only barely, and Hiroto himself has been eliminated. However, the lying transfer student claims this was part of his... Read More →

OTHER WORLDS BOOKS DEPEND BEAN COUNTER LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 02

WriterWakatsu, Yatsuki

ArtistOhashi, Kikka

After getting accidentally summoned to another world, former office worker Seiichiro ends up becoming extremely close with the handsome knight commander Aresh-although what exactly that means remains ambiguous, even after they begin living together. Just as that's happening, Seiichiro meets a priest who reminds him a bit of Aresh. When... Read More →

STARS OF CHAOS SHA PO LANG L NOVEL VOL 03 (C: 0-1-2)

WriterPriest,

ArtistPriest,

The discovery of violet gold, a vital fuel for steam-powered machines, propelled the empire of Great Liang into an age of prosperity. But for Chang Geng, a young man raised on the impoverished northern border, the concerns of the empire are as distant as the stars above. When raiders from... Read More →

This item will not receive discounts.

SUGAR APPLE FAIRY LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 06 (C: 0-1-2)

WriterMikawa, Miri

ArtistAki,

As Anne and the other candy crafters race to finish their sugar candy in time for the First Holy Festival, the unthinkable happens. Lafalle, a beautiful but dangerous fairy with a strange attachment to Challe, attacks the Paige Workshop and kidnaps Anne and her fairy companion. But even now, when... Read More →

UNIMPLEMENTED OVERLORDS JOINED PARTY LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 02 (

WriterNagawasabi64,

Shuutarou and his Evil Overlord pals made it out of Ross Maora Castle, but a spirit barrier is keeping them and the rest of Eternity's players from entering a certain area. In order to progress further in this game world, Shuutarou decides to change character classes...from a swordfighter to a... Read More →

VEXATIONS SHUT IN VAMPIRE PRINCESS LIGHT NOVEL SC VOL 07 (C:

WriterKobayashi, Kotei

Artistriichu,

After returning from her hot springs vacation, Terakomari is immediately thrust into another crisis when Lingzi Ailan, princess of the Enchanted Lands, shows up at the Mulnite Palace begging for help. According to Lingzi, the Grand Chancellor of the Enchanted Lands is in the process of overthrowing the current ruler,... Read More →
